Text: Cc Per our conversation please send any further comments to Jeff D ps I left the cover in the ArialNarrow font all the other docs are Times New Roman

heres a revision to traviss draft for the private equity folks couple of comments for consideration at we do not want to encourage a h election for basis reasons that are different than existed in Northern I have drafted as though TW is issuing the preferred for tax reasons that may cost ENE million per year we want Newco to issue I am not convinced we want to offer same conversion terms as we did Dynegy Areas to think about removing or changing are i do we offer the makewhole and ii should we replace all repurchase scenarios with a redemption structure to avoid the whole change of control issue We need to add or relook at the exchange features given the private equitys motivation to participate in the closing of the merger Thanks Jeff
Cc Attached is a draft cover letter and transaction diagram for the Dynegy deal Travis is going to forward me the executed versions of all the associated documents Let me know your comments Thanks
Re Integration Meetingpst Awesome Jeff Golden

Fw Remaining IT due diligence listpst Who would u like me to coordinate with to get this for ubs Jeff Golden Original Message From Brennan James To Golden Jeff Jeff NRONcom CC Meinel Matt UBS Meisner Joseph Schleimer Andrew Albert L Wells Email Sent Sat Dec Subject Remaining IT due diligence list Jeff Below is the due diligence request list for IT matters from Matt Meinel You may want to direct any questions directly to Matt Rgds James To verify this document we basically need the following info from Enron Comprehensive list of staff that are still employed from Enron Online LLC Jays group Enron Networks LLC Beths and Jennys group and Vince Kaminskis groups Comprehensive inventory of servers workstations and other equipment in Houston and other North American gas and power locations Copies of the front to back detail process flows for the Gas and Power businesses done in April by IT Compliance department Comprehensive proprietary software lists for enron online gas and power trading FTB development and testing tools to support aforementioned applications List of software hardware and market data vendors and third party packages and supporting contracts Network maps Current list of access rights by person to each of the systems listed in the FTB Gas and Power trading Inventory of servers including break down of partitions on multi partition machines Inventory of databases Floor plans of new trading floor computer room and adjacent space that could be physically secured Matt Meinel mobile Visit our website at This message contains confidential information and is intended only for the individual named If you are not the named addressee you should not disseminate distribute or copy this email Please notify the sender immediately by email if you have received this email by mistake and delete this email from your system Email transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or errorfree as information could be intercepted corrupted lost destroyed arrive late or incomplete or contain viruses The sender therefore does not accept liability for any errors or omissions in the contents of this message which arise as a result of email transmission If verification is required please request a hardcopy version This message is provided for informational purposes and should not be construed as a solicitation or offer to buy or sell any securities or related financial instruments

Deal issuespst Some things to be ready for Please forward to john if appropriate Buyer will likely require netco to use their form of isda and related contracts We wont know winner and form of contract until monday Earliest we could trade would be next friday Is or days enpugh to make platform changes for EoL and related systems I just learned that under the DIP documents that became effective last monday we cannot execute any new trades except in connection with liquidating old book Stclair is running this down for your benefit and clarification Alberta ppa was sold When is closing Depending on canada bankruptcy ruling in next day we may be able to access these funds to help support newco ops Needs furtther investigation Jeff Jeff Golden
Re UBSW due diligence IT portion Cc Louise I took care of this Jeff Golden

FW second email requestpst In addition to other requests from UBS concerning credit these were added I forwarded these to Bill Bradford as well but they are a bit more strategic so Im sending them to you as well We are targeting tomorrow afternoon evening to have a discussion with the UBS credit team Original Message From Wadlington Mark Sent Monday December PM To Golden Jeff Subject second email request Please pass on to bill bradford these are the followup questions Hope your singing voice comes back Explain the five worst losses Provide examples of the five or ten trading strategies that we will anticipate using particularly in the early stages Theyd like to meet with david port midmorning to talk about models risk parameters Regards Mark

FW Transition Services Agreement Cc legal Greg Im sure mitch and I would be happy to help broker thisIm sure its getting the right people at the table for an hour Id suggest fallon louise lance and mary korby from weil Any ohers Jeff Jeff Golden Original Message From Schuler Lance Legal LanceSchuler NRONcom To Taylor Mitch Mitchell NRONcom Golden Jeff Jeff NRONcom Sent Fri Feb Subject FW Transition Services Agreement I am going to need you guys to help weigh in Thanks Lance W Lance Schuler Enron North America Corp Smith Street Houston Texas Phone Fax Email Original Message From Racicot Paul Sent Friday February PM To Fallon Jim Cc Schuler Lance Legal Sager Elizabeth Miller Don Asset Mktg Dimichele Rich Subject Transition Services Agreement Jim There is a lot of confusion over the scope and scale of services that the estate will require from UBS over the next several months During the negotiations over the Transistion Services Agreement it was clearly contemplated that the estate will need UBS to schedule and purchase power as an agent of the estate However most of the UBS team does not understand or expect to provide these types of services I know that you have coordinated with Greg Whalley but I feel it is necessary that we have a broader coordination meeting between the two organizations I think this meeting needs to happen at your level Thanks Paul
Re Where is the transistion services agreementpst Kyle is working with atorneys Jeff Golden
I have a dreampst I have a dream that one day before friday the estate receive a copy of the western fundamentalsI have a dreaman you help me Keep smiling Were almost done Jeff Golden
